commit.message:
Rollup merge of #58802 - nnethercote:inline-record_layout, r=oli-obk

Ensure `record_layout_for_printing()` is inlined.

This reduces instruction counts for the `ctfe-stress-2` benchmark by
about 1%.

r? @oli-obk
